title: prod-profile configuration pollutes test profile in integration tests
body:
### Describe the bug

The bug was introduces in Quarkus version `3.5.2`; it was not present in version `3.5.1`.

When we have configuration values for the `prod` profile in the `application.properties`, they "pollute" the profile set for `quarkus.test.integration-test-profile`, possibly leading to the test failing because the application fails to start.

An example:

We use an application with a postgres database, `quarkus-smallrye-health` and the following `application.properties`:

```properties
quarkus.http.test-port=-1
quarkus.test.integration-test-profile=test
quarkus.datasource.db-kind=postgresql
%prod.quarkus.datasource.username=${DB_USER}
%prod.quarkus.datasource.password=${DB_PASSWORD}
%prod.quarkus.datasource.jdbc.additional-jdbc-properties.foo=${FOO}
```

We test that the database connection (provided by a devservice) is established with the following `@QuarkusTest`:

```java
package de.turing85.quarkus.properties;

import io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusTest;
import io.restassured.RestAssured;
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;

import static org.hamcrest.CoreMatchers.is;

@QuarkusTest
class HealthTest {
  @Test
  void healthTest() {
    // @formatter:off
    RestAssured
        .when().get("/q/health")
        .then()
            .body("checks.find { it.name = 'Database connections health check' }.status", is("UP"))
            .body("checks.find { it.name = 'Database connections health check' }.data.'<default>'", is("UP"));
    // @formatter:on
  }
}
```

and the following `@QuarkusIntegrationTest`:

```java
package de.turing85.quarkus.properties;

import io.quarkus.test.junit.QuarkusIntegrationTest;

@QuarkusIntegrationTest
class HealthTestIT extends HealthTest {
}
```

When we now run the tests, the application fails to start in the failsafe tests (the surefire tests work fine):

### Expected behavior

The tests should succeed.

### Actual behavior

The application fails to start with the above error

### How to Reproduce?

Reproducer:
- clone https://github.com/turing85/quarkus-properties:
  ```bash
  git clone https://github.com/turing85/quarkus-properties.git && quarkus-properties
  ```
- build the application, run the tests:
  ```bash
  ./mvnw clean verify
  ```
- Observe the error mentioned above
- Open `pom.xml`, set `quarkus.platform.version` from `3.5.2` to `3.5.1`
- Re-run the tests:
  ```bash
  ./mvnw clean verify
  ```
- Observe that the build succeeds
